Package net.jdazher.infrastructure.tasks.database.adapters

Class MongoDBTaskManagementAdapter

java.lang.Object
net.jdazher.infrastructure.tasks.database.adapters.MongoDBTaskManagementAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskRepository
@Component public class MongoDBTaskManagementAdapter extends Object implements TaskRepository
Adapter class for managing tasks in a MongoDB data source.

This class implements the TaskRepository interface, providing concrete methods for task management using Spring Data MongoDB.

It acts as a bridge between the application's task management logic and the MongoDB data store, facilitating operations such as retrieving, saving, and updating tasks.
